title: Affordability a 2026 Concern: Amalgamated CEO
description: Priscilla Sims Brown, Amalgamated Bank CEO, says most people agree affordability is a major concern. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that the bank is deeply engaged in its Commercial Property Assessed Clean Energy program and that 40% of its lending is climate related. (Source: Bloomberg)
